Surfer Organic (F1) Leek Seed

Product ID:4150G.114150G

An upright, medium-long leek with blue-green foliage that is very easy to strip and clean. Cold-hardy to facilitate fall harvest. Stores well. Bred for organic systems. Intermediate resistance to common rust and purple blotch. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 169,300 seeds/lb. Packet: 50 seeds.
